name: Core\Lib\Utilities\Arr
short_desc: Contains functions that support array operations.

add.name: add
add.short_desc: Add a value to an array if the key does not exist.

arrayDivide.name: arrayDivide
arrayDivide.short_desc: Split an array into two separate arrays: one with keys, one with values.
arrayDivide.hint_desc: An array containing two arrays: [keys, values].

arrayPluckMulti.name: arrayPluckMulti
arrayPluckMulti.short_desc: Pluck a nested value from an array.

arrayShuffleAssoc.name: arrayShuffleAssoc
arrayShuffleAssoc.short_desc: Shuffle an associative array while preserving keys.

collapse.name: collapse
collapse.short_desc: Collapse a multi-dimensional array into a single-level array.

chunk.name: chunk
chunk.short_desc: Split an array into chunks of a given size.

chunkBy.name: chunkBy
chunkBy.short_desc: Chunk an array into groups based on a callback function.

contains.name: contains
contains.short_desc: Determine if a given value exists in an array.
contains.hint_desc: True if the value exists, false otherwise.

strict.name: strict
strict.short_desc: Whether to perform a strict comparison.

crossJoin.name: crossJoin
crossJoin.short_desc: Compute the Cartesian product of multiple arrays.

arrays.name: arrays
arrays.short_desc: The arrays to compute the product for.

deepMerge.name: deepMerge
deepMerge.short_desc: Recursively merge two or more arrays.

diffAssocRecursive.name: diffAssocRecursive
diffAssocRecursive.short_desc: Recursively compute the difference between two arrays with keys.

dot.name: dot
dot.short_desc: Convert a multi-dimensional array into dot notation keys.
dot.hint_desc: The array with dot notation keys.

except.name: except
except.short_desc: Get all items except the specified keys.

exists.name: exists
exists.short_desc: Check if a key exists in an array (non-dot notation).
exists.hint_desc: True if the key exists, false otherwise.

fill.name: fill
fill.short_desc: Fill an array with a specified value.

count.name: count
count.short_desc: The number of elements to insert.

value.name: value
value.short_desc: The value to use for filling.

filter.name: filter
filter.short_desc: Filter an array using a callback function.

filterByKeys.name: filterByKeys
filterByKeys.short_desc: Filter an array to include only the specified keys.

filterByValue.name: filterByValue
filterByValue.short_desc: Filter an array by its values.

callback.name: callback
callback.short_desc: The function to apply for filtering.

first.name: first
first.short_desc: Get the first element that passes a given test.
first.hint_desc: The first matching value or default.

callback.name: callback
callback.short_desc: The function to determine a match.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: The default value if no match is found.

flatten.name: flatten
flatten.short_desc: Flatten a multi-dimensional array into a single level.

flattenWithDepth.name: flattenWithDepth
flattenWithDepth.short_desc: Flatten an array up to a specified depth.

flattenKeys.name: flattenKeys
flattenKeys.short_desc: Convert a multi-dimensional array into dot notation keys.

forget.name: forget
forget.short_desc: Remove a value from an array using dot notation.

get.name: get
get.short_desc: Get a value from an array using dot notation.
get.hint_desc: The value from the array or the default.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: The default value if the key is not found.

groupBy.name: groupBy
groupBy.short_desc: Group an array by a given key.

has.name: has
has.short_desc: Check if an array has a given key using dot notation.
has.hint_desc: True if the key exists, false otherwise.

hasAllKeys.name: hasAllKeys
hasAllKeys.short_desc: Check if all given keys exist in the array.
hasAllKeys.hint_desc: True if all keys exist, otherwise false.

hasAnyKey.name: hasAnyKey
hasAnyKey.short_desc: Check if at least one key exists in the array.
hasAnyKey.hint_desc: True if any key exists, otherwise false.

hasAny.name: hasAny
hasAny.short_desc: Determine if at least one of the given keys exists in the array.
hasAny.hint_desc: True if any key exists, false otherwise.

keys.name: keys
keys.short_desc: The list of keys to check.

insertBefore.name: insertBefore
insertBefore.short_desc: Insert an element before a given key in an array.

insertAfter.name: insertAfter
insertAfter.short_desc: Insert an element after a given key in an array.

isArray.name: isArray
isArray.short_desc: Determine if a given value is an array.
isArray.hint_desc: True if the value is an array, false otherwise.

isAssoc.name: isAssoc
isAssoc.short_desc: Determine if an array is associative (i.e., contains at least one non-numeric key).

isEmpty.name: isEmpty
isEmpty.short_desc: Check if the given array is empty.
isEmpty.hint_desc: True if empty or null, otherwise false.

isNotEmpty.name: isNotEmpty
isNotEmpty.short_desc: Check if the given array is not empty.
isNotEmpty.hint_desc: True if not empty, otherwise false.

keys.name: keys
keys.short_desc: Get all the keys from an array.

array.name: array
array.short_desc: The array to extract keys from.

keyBy.name: keyBy
keyBy.short_desc: Reindex an array using a specified key.

last.name: last
last.short_desc: Get the last element that passes a given test.
last.hint_desc: The last matching value or default.

callback.name: callback
callback.short_desc: The function to determine a match.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: The default value if no match is found.

map.name: map
map.short_desc: Apply a callback to each item in an array.

mapWithKeys.name: mapWithKeys
mapWithKeys.short_desc: Map an array while preserving keys.
mapWithKeys.hint_desc: The modified array with new keys.

merge.name: merge
merge.short_desc: Merge one or more arrays together.

only.name: only
only.short_desc: Get only the specified keys from an array.

partition.name: partition
partition.short_desc:
Partition an array into two arrays:
One where the callback returns true, the other where it returns false.
partition.hint_desc: An array with two arrays (true, false).

pluck.name: pluck
pluck.short_desc: Pluck a single key from an array.

value.name: value
value.short_desc: The key to extract values for.

key.name: key
key.short_desc: Optional key to use as array index.

prepend.name: prepend
prepend.short_desc: Prepend a value to an array.

key.name: key
key.short_desc: Optional key for the prepended value.

pull.name: pull
pull.short_desc: Retrieve a value from the array and remove it.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: The default value if the key is not found.

push.name: push
push.short_desc: Push one or more values onto the end of an array.

random.name: random
random.short_desc: Get a random value or multiple values from an array.

reject.name: reject
reject.short_desc: Reject elements that match a given condition.

reverse.name: reverse
reverse.short_desc: Reverse the order of elements in an array.

preserveKeys.name: preserveKeys
preserveKeys.short_desc: Whether to preserve keys in the reversed array.

rotate.name: rotate
rotate.short_desc: Rotate an array left or right.

positions.name: positions
positions.short_desc: Number of positions to rotate (positive for right, negative for left).

search.name: search
search.short_desc: Search for a value in an array and return the corresponding key.
search.hint_desc: The key if found, false otherwise.

strict.name: strict
strict.short_desc: Whether to perform a strict type comparison.

set.name: set
set.short_desc: Set a value within an array using dot notation.

shift.name: shift
shift.short_desc: Remove and return the first element of an array.
shift.hint_desc: The removed element or null if the array is empty.

array.name: array
array.short_desc: The array to shift from (passed by reference).

sort.name: sort
sort.short_desc: Sort an array using a callback function.

sortAssoc.name: sortAssoc
sortAssoc.short_desc: Sort an associative array by its keys.

descending.name: descending
descending.short_desc: Whether to sort in descending order.

sortBy.name: sortBy
sortBy.short_desc: Sort an array by a specific key.

descending.name: descending
descending.short_desc: Whether to sort in descending order.

sortByKeys.name: sortByKeys
sortByKeys.short_desc: Sort an array by its keys.

sortByValues.name: sortByValues
sortByValues.short_desc: Sort an array by its values.

swapKeys.name: swapKeys
swapKeys.short_desc: Swap two keys in an array.

toJson.name: toJson
toJson.short_desc: Convert an array to a JSON string.

toObject.name: toObject
toObject.short_desc: Convert an array to an object.

unique.name: unique
unique.short_desc: Remove duplicate values from an array.

uniqueBy.name: uniqueBy
uniqueBy.short_desc: Remove duplicate items from an array based on a key or callback.

key.name: key
key.short_desc: The key or function to determine uniqueness.

unsetKeys.name: unsetKeys
unsetKeys.short_desc: Remove multiple keys from an array.
unsetKeys.hint_desc: The array without the specified keys.

unwrap.name: unwrap
unwrap.short_desc: Unwrap an array if it contains only one item.
unwrap.hint_desc: The single value or the original array.

values.name: values
values.short_desc: Return all values from an array, resetting numeric keys.

walkRecursive.name: walkRecursive
walkRecursive.short_desc: Recursively applies a callback function to each element in an array.
walkRecursive.long_desc:
This function modifies each value in the array using the provided callback.
The callback receives both the value and the key of each array element.
walkRecursive.hint_desc: The modified array with the callback applied to each value.

callback.name: callback
callback.short_desc:
The callback function to apply.
The callback should accept two parameters:
- mixed $value (the array value)
- string|int $key (the array key)

weightedRandom.name: weightedRandom
weightedRandom.short_desc: Select a random element based on weighted probabilities.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.short_desc: Wrap a value in an array.

where.name: where
where.short_desc: Filter an array using a callback.

callback.name: callback
callback.short_desc: The function to apply to each element.

xorDiff.name: xorDiff
xorDiff.short_desc: Compute the exclusive difference between two arrays.
xorDiff.hint_desc: The values that exist only in one of the arrays.
